New Records: Sri Lanka ensured the lowest all-out total in Bengaluru.
Key Match Events: Sri Lanka handed England an eight-wicket thrashing.
Pathum Nissanka hit an undefeated 77, his fourth successive fifty at the tournament.
Ben Stokes was the only significant resistance in England's batting with 43 runs.
Lahiru Kumara took 3 wickets for 35 runs.
Angelo Mathews dismissed Dawid Malan and helped run out Joe Root.
Kasun Rajitha took 2 wickets for 36 runs.
Sri Lanka restricted England to 156 all out in 33.2 overs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka pushed England to the brink of World Cup elimination.
The match was held at the Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru, India.
England's middle-order collapsed in the face of some incisive bowling.
Jonny Bairstow survived an LBW chance but was later dismissed by Kasun Rajitha.
Angelo Mathews was called in as an injury replacement for Matheesha Pathirana.
